title: OCE Katarina Club
body:
**PLEASE READ THE WHOLE POST**

------
Nov 2015

I have created a club on OCE for katarina players.

Club name is Katarina and the tag is Kat

If you would like to join please send either "Clarkey" or "Ark" a friend request.

------
Oct 2019

Club is still going strong, almost at 100 members and an active chat/discord, keep your requests coming :)

------
Jan 2020

Club is now overflowing and we have decided to raise the requirements so that the most active Kat mains get to use the tag. 

Now that the club can't fit everyone, we have also decided to open up our discord, feel free to join using this link, everyone is welcome: [Katarina Mains OCE](https://discord.gg/r2Aqqwd) 

Message an officer in the discord if Katarina is in your top 3 for mastery points and you have at least 50k Kat mastery points and we will see if we can find you a spot in the club.

replies.body:
Oh wow, seems like this thread is still active. It would be a dream come true to join an OG club for a champion I love <3 

IGN is yilee

can you please add me? MeTiioRiTe
:)
izunv pls shoot me an invite!

Does this mean that if I join some people will teach me Katarina? My ingame name is the same as my username. I like kata but can't seem to do that well with her so can you add me and have someone teach me?
